```{r packages, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, cache=FALSE}

library(tidyr)
library(kableExtra)

library(dplyr)
library(tippy)
options(knitr.table.format = "html", knitr.kable.NA = '')
```

```{r read data, echo=FALSE}
data.raw <- read_excel("Data/FollowUp.xlsx")

```

Occurence indicates whether the question is currently included in either the baseline or the follow-up survey.

```{r display data, echo=FALSE}

data.raw %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = T, position = "center", bootstrap_options = "striped", "hover","condensed", "responsive")
```
